column4: Good day all, why might I get this error message when trying to update? W:Failed to fetch http://ppa.launchpad.net/team-xbmc/ppa/ubuntu/dists/oneiric/main/source/Sources  404  Not Found
, E:Some index files failed to download. They have been ignored, or old ones used instead.
there is no xmbc package for 11.10 in that ppa
